short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you enjoy music more by replacing all of Pitchfork's ratings with 8.0

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assigning numerical scores to album reviews is a terrible way to approach music criticism. Pitchfork is the worst offender of this, touting their scores as objective and universal. However, their reviews are often insightful and worth reading. This extension reduces the reader's bias towards an album created by Pitchfork's score by simply replacing the score with "8.0".
